text:
Venmo -- New York, Chicago, San Francisco -- (full time)

We're working to make payments between friends the most seamless experience possible. Together with our parent company Braintree, we're processing $10 billion/year. (http://www.forbes.com/sites/amitchowdhry/2013/07/03/chicago-...)
